p: Following the washing of the samples three times with 50 mM Tris-HCl + 0.1 M Na 2SO 4 (pH 8.0), each sample was homogenised in liquid nitrogen. Samples then transferred to the same buffer, and centrifuged at 15,000 g for 60 min at 4 °C. Further studies were performed with the supernatant. Below mentioned enzyme activities were spectrophotomethrically measured.
